sentence.Network_en: Transplant the seedlings into peaty soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 把幼苗移栽到含泥炭的土壤里.

sentence.Network_en: The best solution for neutralising acidic or peaty soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 最佳的解答为中立化酸性或泥煤似土壤.

sentence.Network_en: He # cc 0066 > transplanted the seedlings into peaty soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把幼苗 移栽 到含泥炭的土壤里.
